## CreateSelectorOptions.argsMemoizeOptions property

Optional configuration options for the  function. These options are passed to the  function as the second argument.

**Signature:**

```typescript
argsMemoizeOptions?: OverrideMemoizeOptions<ArgsMemoizeFunction, OverrideArgsMemoizeFunction>;
```
